textTemplates.name: NotificationBodyTemplate
textTemplates.text: Duplicate Lead Created for {!$Record.ParentLead__r.LeadNumber__c} and the new lead is {!$Record.LeadNumber__c}

textTemplates.name: SMSMSBody
textTemplates.text: Dear, New Lead Assigned To you. Lead Name: {!$Record.Name}, Lead Number: {!$Record.LeadNumber__c}.

textTemplates.name: WhatsAppLink
textTemplates.text: https://wa.me/+97128107696?text=Hello, I'm interested in {!$Record.Project__c} and I would like to know more about the project. My reference number is {!$Record.LeadNumber__c}

textTemplates.name: WhatsAppLinkSMS
textTemplates.text: Thank you for your interest in Adlar Properties.Our Advisor will Contact you shortly.To Continue your conversation via WhatsApp,please click on the following

textTemplates.name: WhatsAppLinkSMSWithoutLink
textTemplates.text: Thank you for your interest in Adlar Properties.Our Advisor will Contact you shortly.
